summary: A face for Brelyna that more closely matches her sweet voice.
descriptionHtml:
I couldn\\\'t stand the fact that Brelyna had such a lovely voice but was kinda hard to look at, so I made her a new face. I also mildly tweaked her stats/spells to make her slightly more useful in combat. The younger appearance is due to the Dunmer skin from Final Younger Characters by Toshiki, so grab that and also Natural Eyes by nevenbridge to get her looking exactly like the screenshots. :)

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/20785-1-1342720043.jpg[/img]

Installation:
Simply extract the files to your Skyrim folder

Notes: If you only want the facial appearance changes, uncheck BrelynaMaryon.esp


Mods used in screenshots:
Final Younger Characters by Toshiki - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2332
Natural Eyes by nevenbridge - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589 (darker eyes)
author: Wingwang
